components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Report Delays to Asiacell Network in Iraq

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing delays in receiving message delivery reports when sending to Asiacell network in Iraq. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing delays in receiving message delivery reports when sending to Asiacell network in Iraq. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Outbound Call Failures From a Subset of Twilio's Phone Numbers to Netherlands.

incident_updates.body: We are investigating outbound call failures from a subset of Twilio's Phone Numbers to KPN Netherlands. Our engineering team is working with our carrier partners to resolve this. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Personnal Communicational, Win Mobile and Volna mobile

incident_updates.body: The Personnal Communicational, Win Mobile and Volna mobile networks in Russia are conducting a planned maintenance from 04 September 2025 at 10:00 PDT until 04 September 2025 at 13:59 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Personnal Communicational, Win Mobile and Volna mobile Russia handsets.

The MegaFon network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 04 September 2025 at 15:00 PDT until 04 September 2025 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to MegaFon Russia handsets.

Twilio is conducting an emergency maintenance from 4 September 2025 at 16:30 PDT until 4 September 2025 at 19:30 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for the following country and carrier: Indonesia - Telkomsel, XL Axiata, Indosat, Smartfren

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States and Canada Twilio SMS and MMS Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Twilio is conducting a planned maintenance from 04 September 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 05 September 2025 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays or failures delivering SMS and MMS to and from United States and Canada handsets when sending via long codes, short codes and toll free numbers.

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 01 September 2025 at 13:00 PDT until 29 September 2025 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

01 September 2025 at 13:00 PDT until 01 September 2025 at 17:00 PDT
03 September 2025 at 13:00 PDT until 03 September 2025 at 17:00 PDT
08 September 2025 at 13:00 PDT until 08 September 2025 at 17:00 PDT
10 September 2025 at 13:00 PDT until 10 September 2025 at 17:00 PDT
15 September 2025 at 13:00 PDT until 15 September 2025 at 17:00 PDT
17 September 2025 at 13:00 PDT until 17 September 2025 at 17:00 PDT
22 September 2025 at 13:00 PDT until 22 September 2025 at 17:00 PDT
24 September 2025 at 13:00 PDT until 24 September 2025 at 17:00 PDT
29 September 2025 at 13:00 PDT until 29 September 2025 at 17:00 PDT

We are aware of the short notice and are working with our Carrier Partners to provide earlier notification where possible.
